# Manifestos

This folder gathers the manifestos of the main candidates to the 2022 French presidential election. 

Manifestos are provided in one text-file. 
Each line represents one sentence. 
Titles are marked by an initial flag `TITLE-`.

Following manifestos are available in the folder [`data`](https://github.com/benjaminguinaudeau/presidata2022/manifesto/data): 

| Parti | Candidat  | Source | 
| -- | ------------- | ------------- |
| EELV | Yannick Jadot  | [Lien](dddd)  |
| La France insoumise | Jean-Luc Mélenchon   | Non disponnible publiquement  |
| Les Républicains | Valérie Pécresse   | [Lien](dddd)  |
| Parti Communiste Français | Fabien Roussel   | [Lien](dddd)  |
